name: Articles Details
description: Get all online article fields, accessible to the user.

queryParams.description:

App: Visible in the internal Salesforce Knowledge application
Pkb: Visible in the public knowledge base
Csp: Visible in the Customer Portal
Prm: Visible in the Partner Portal
Optional, defaults to true. If true, API updates the view count in the given channel as well as the total view count.
Optional, defaults to false. If true, indicates that the last portion of the endpoint is a URL name instead of an article ID. Available in API v44.0 and later
